name: Save Them 2.5d
description: "Save Them" is a open world 2D game where your goal is to explore an abandoned survival camp in order to look for a cure to bring back your zombified friends from the dead.  You are armed with only a simple pistol with very limited ammo and will need to use skill to avoid getting eaten.  There are three unique endings that can be unlocked which vary based on how you interact with the zombies throughout the game.  There are plenty of collectables  that are hidden across the small colorful map.  This game fits the theme of "There and Back" by relating it to the overall quest of the hero which is to retrieve syringes holding the cure and bring it back to his tent.  The concept also fits the idea that your zombie friends have been lost to the infection and need to be brought "back" to normal conditions in order to  survive.  I hope you enjoy my first game. I worked tirelessly during the week trying to make the best experience possible.  Enjoy -Dylan.
